mapper.insert: insert into `group` (group_id, group_name, max_count, admin_id, creator_id, is_admin_created) VALUES (#{groupName}, #{maxCount}, #{adminId}, #{creatorId}, #{adminCreated})
mapper.select: select group_id, group_name, max_count, admin_id, creator_id, is_admin_created from `group`
select g.group_id, g.group_name, g.max_count, g.admin_id, g.creator_id, g.is_admin_created from `group` g left join user_group ug on g.group_id = ug.group_id where ug.user_id = #{userId}

select group_id, group_name, max_count, `group`.admin_id, creator_id, is_admin_created, user_name, admin_name from `group`, user, admin where `group`.creator_id = user.user_id and `group`.admin_id = admin.admin_id
select u.user_id, u.user_name from user u left join user_group ug on u.user_id = ug.user_id where ug.group_id = #{groupId}

select group_id, group_name, max_count, `group`.admin_id, creator_id, is_admin_created, user_name, admin_name from `group`, user, admin where `group`.creator_id = user.user_id and `group`.admin_id = admin.admin_id and admin.admin_id = #{adminId}
